title: Drawing, "Portrait of a Man", 1803–06
medium: Graphite on off-white laid paper mounted on blue wove paper (counterproof)
signed: Lower right in pen and gray ink: Wicar

Drawing, "Portrait of a Man", 1803–06.
1803–06. Graphite on off-white laid paper mounted on blue wove paper (counterproof). Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7046.
